message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I believe a price of $925,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $750,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. However, my original offer reflects the true value of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway â€“ how about $837,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $775,000 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your negotiation, but I need to be firm on this. $800,000 is the absolute lowest I can go. It's a fantastic deal considering its worth to you.
I understand your position, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $795,000 for the product. I think this is a reasonable compromise considering the value to me.
